name: Lovely Massacre
description:
In an adorable world where there is only happiness and love, an unexpected guest will come to end all kinds of life.

A hack and slash game where the spirit resides in the combination of Kawaii and Gore themes to offer a crazy contrast.

Project made by: Arnau, Erik, Oriol, Sergi, David and Enric

Download instructions:

- Download the compressed file

- Unzip the file where you want

- Open the folder

- Execute the file "Candyland.exe"
